alert.note: Alert for De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 11 at 7:54AM CDT until May 11 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 753 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Logansport, or 13 miles southwest of Mansfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern De Soto Parish, including the following locations... Stanley. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
